title: Mermaid
description: The female version of the üßú Merperson emoji.
apple_vendor_description: The mermaid emoji on Apple devices is a captivating depiction of a mythical sea creature, with a shimmering, scaled tail that catches the light and a graceful upper body. Rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and vibrant, oceanic colors, she possesses a whimsical and enchanting aura. This emoji evokes fantasy, dreams, mystery, and a connection to the ocean's allure, often used to express wonder or a desire for the magical on Apple devices.
